ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to find `OrchardCore.Notifications` feature when preview packages are installed in a provate project
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug I have a custom solution where I am using OC preview. If I search for `Notifications` module, it isn't listed as a feature unless I explictly install `OrchardCore.Notifications` directly in my host project. I think the issue is the `OrchardCore.Notifications` project is included in `OrchardCore.Application.Cms.Core.Targets` project without `PrivateAssets="none"`
